website_summaries.verdict: While it's a good choice, we think it's worth spending the extra money on other models.
pros: We especially love the simple swivel system
Great for those who don't want to use a lot of strength to handle the vacuum
cons: The smaller brush width means it will take much longer to clean rooms

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 weeks - beware, Shark's warranty does not cover defective product
customer_reviews.text: UNBELIEVABLE! Read this first before purchasing ANY Shark Vacuum products. I purchased a new Shark on January 22 of this year. Less than a month later, the roller brush stopped working. It is frozen and no trouble shooting tips would get it to work. So, I called Shark. They had no fix for this but they are willing to sell me a replacement part - replacing the entire head of the vacuum. Apparently, this part of the vacuum is not covered under their warranty and it makes no difference at all that I have owned this vacuum for less than 3 weeks. I will not be purchasing from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie F. White

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $200
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not worth $200. Mine has lasted only 2 years. I liked it while it worked. The 5 years warranty is worthless because I removed the bottom plate to check the belt myself. The brush stopped working prior to that so I was just checking the belt but it was fine. Their best offer was to sell me another unit at a discounted price of $130 but I declined. I believe the switch went bad but they will not service that and part is not available from the manufacturer. It all seems a little rinky-dink to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't vacuum thick or plush carpet
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. I had hoped with the suction release ring I could vacuum my dense pile area rug a littler easier. Not the case. The brush won't turn and the suction is still too high so it is very difficult to move. Even worse- my other area rug is a higher pile- nowhere near shag but still high pile; essentially plush carpet. My Dyson Animal will vacuum it with no problem. The brush on this vacuum kept turning off. Essentially, this product is made for commercial carpet or Berber. I'm not keeping a $190 vacuum just for my stairs.
customer_reviews.author: MFinnegan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with accessories as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My Shark Navigator didn't come with the hardwood attachment and micro fiber pads as advertised. Disappointed. That was one of the main reasons we bought this vacuum to help us with the hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Very Short life
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these....the second close to when we purchased the first one, because the price seemed solid. They have since both not been able to withstand basic household vacuuming...the filters have to be cleaned/replaced far more often than originally explained to maintain maximum performance, and we still have issues with the motors that will cost more to fix than to replace the units themselves. Save your time and money and go find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Died after less then a year, no support from the company.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this vacuum looked great, the portability of it was easy to use. After nine months of moderate use the roller stops spinning. I called Shark about the warranty and was told my only option was to replace the entire roller head for half the cost of the original vacuum. The only part of the vacuum that is covered is the motor, and if that breaks you have to pay shipping and install the new motor yourself. The vacuum is garbage, the warranty is garbage and you won't get any help from the company. Do not buy this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Fail!
customer_reviews.text: It was great until it wasn’t. I called customer service due to the plastic piece breaking where the attachment meets the vacuum to allow for upright push mode-the customer service man was so rude. He told me that someone would call me in 2-4 weeks when the replacement part would come in. Now, 6 weeks later, the entire vacuum doesn’t work and I’m without a vacuum. Very disappointed in their customer support. unfortunately, my experience was not positive and I will not be buying Shark again.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCass

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Dyson.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have bought 3 or 4 Dyson's over the years the last two broke pretty quickly. One of them was the Dyson Animal vacuum. Big, bulky, and expensive. I was never really sold on them. We have a husky and she drops fur all year long. So, when I went looking for a replacement I didn't want to break the bank but still wanted one that would hold up for more than a year. This Shark is the best vacuum I have ever had! Better suction, light weight, strong spinning brush and easy to clean. I will never buy a Dyson again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or hassle.
customer_reviews.text: 1. The vacuum cannot function on thick carpet. 2. The vacuum falls over and is just awkward to use. 3. The vacuum requires a brush roll cleaning multiple times during a single use. (During its first use even!) 4. You will want to take a shower after using the vacuum because you will be covered in whatever you had to pull out of the brush roll and a bunch of dust/dander from emptying the cannister.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. McGoldrick

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and weak
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy , but very narrow , so lots of back and forth. Pivoting head is just a gimmick. Suction is no better than my old vac. , just fair. There is no storage for the power head , so keep it somewhere and go get it if you need it. Emptying the dust container is awkward - open the top and empty then open the bottom and empty again , and then get a screwdriver or something to dig out the trapped trash stuck between the inner part and the outer part. All in all it just feels cheap and I would not by if I had used one first.
customer_reviews.author: W.E.Copeland

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: ok the vacuum works good but you cant take the plate off the bottom of the brush without a special driver--cant find one in any location. guess shark sells one as they made it to prevent average guy from being able to clean out the hair and carpet runners from the beater brush? so once you get this clogged up good luck pulling individual strands from the brush instead of being able to pull free and cut away spun threads from brush
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs, two cats and a boyfriend that live with me so I am constantly cleaning my home and this vacuum is a game changer. The pet hair attachment works wonders on my black couch. I thought I would need to replace my carpets but after shampooing them and using the brush setting on this vacuum they look like different carpets. It’s light and the dust trap is easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Marli

customer_reviews.title: Threw the Hoover in the garbage.......
customer_reviews.text: We're a busy outdoor family - the Shih Tzu is in and out as many times as you can count, bringing in leaves, dirt, stones, and today mud ( they were working on a water main down the street and he HAD to supervise - very dirty feet) This machine gets it all...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Cieslak

customer_reviews.title: Regret purchase
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe all the positive reviews. That’s is the reason I bought it, which I regret. It’s heavy, cumbersome, and tips over each and every time I use the top handle for attachments. The suction is decent, but the only really positive thing I can say is that it is resilient. Can’t count the times it’s fallen over on concrete floors and the darn thing keeps working. Hoping one day it doesn’t so I can replace it!
customer_reviews.author: George Baum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for busy moms and dads!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Not only do I have two giant, constantly shedding dogs, hardwood floors that scratch way to easy and carpet. I also have an at home DAYCARE! This is so easy to use. Cleaning at the end of my day dreaded, but this has made life easier. It’s suction power is fantastic. After cleaning my wood floors and switching the button to carpet, the vacuum actually pulls! I feel silly leaving such an excited sounding review but I’m a busy mom and this has just made life a little easier. I decided to leave this review as I was looking for accessories and whatever I need to purchase to keep this vacuum running great for as long as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Shark Professional Vacuum. I don't care for this one at all. The hose is tighter and shorter and when I use it the vacuum falls over so easy. All latches and knobs are harder to use and you have to go through more when undoing the hose or unlocking the tank to dump dirt collected. The carpet cleaner isn’t as good as the refurbished one I had. It has a smaller head. Got real mad at it today when i found my extra parts from my old vac don’t fit this model even tho they are the same with this one being a newer model. Not happy at all but too late to send back.
customer_reviews.author: g@montana

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: The suction is good. but the rest has many design flaws. The two biggest problems are the onboard tool holder design.....the tools fall off constantly. Our pet hair attachment broke into pieces on the first use from falling off and onto the ceramic tile. Poor design. Second, the bottom hose that connects the base to the top half, the hose is not designed to fit snug. It pops off any time you bump the corner on a wall or furniture. If you try to vac under a dining room table or under furniture, you could have to put the hose back on or pick up the tools multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schware

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This makes my second one. The only difference is my first model was the Q where this ends in E.. all my attachments work on this one and all my filters so I didn't have to purchase my old attachments like the breakaway dust mop, etc. I have 4 German Shepherds so I have to have a great one that will pick up the hair of course and this is the best one for my home. I have hardwood floors throughout the house. My old vac was several years old and just died but it was used 7 days a week just like this one will be so hopefully I get several years out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Died after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: This vaccuum cleaner started out ok, a bit heavy and pushing it around was work, but I was fine with that. I'm not fine with the fact that I paid 200 bucks for a vaccuum cleaner that crapped out on me 9 months after purchase. It's not like I overused it either. But today as I was trying to clean up, old sharky just stopped running midway over the living room carpet. I don't know what happened, but it over heated hasn't turned on since. Only half of my carpet is clean. Not the kind of balance I'm looking for in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Hoovers, Electrolux, Eureka.... and this one sucks. In a good way. You can feel the drag and the suction it has as you drag it around the carpet. Does it take more strength to vacuum? Yes. But that also means it sucks dirt from way deep down the carpet. If you can roll that cleaner around like nothing, chances are it is not doing what it is suppose to do. Been using it for two weeks and my mom already said get another one for upstairs. Never used Shark before, and after all the research, its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my Shark!
customer_reviews.text: I have always just bought the cheap vacuums thinking they were just as good as the more expensive ones. I was in the market for a new one and starting asking friends and was surprised how many were using a Shark and loved them. Went ahead and orders this one to give it a try, let’s just say I should have made the switch many years ago. This vacuum is really nice, easy to use and has great suction power. I love that I can turn the brush off to do hard floors, it eliminates needs a broom while doing floors.
customer_reviews.author: AJones Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: My vacuum bit the dust and this one came recommended by Amazon, so I bought it, but the suction power is laughable. Although it did pick up some hair and dust, it left just as much. I wish I could afford something better. I do love the see-through canister and the fact that you don't have to use a bag. I thought the power cord was poorly placed - it was always in the way, and I had to continually bend over to get hold of it and move it. The entire vacuum seemed cheesy.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Addict

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and bulky
customer_reviews.text: I feel misled by the Amazon reviews, this vacuum is SO heavy my wrist is killing me, on the hardwoods it somehow blows the dirt behind itself so when I look back I have to revacuum where I just was and in the rug I can barely move it the suction is too much, I put my entire body weight into pushing it forward! I do appreciate being able to get into corners and do the stairs easily by disconnecting the top... the cord gets caught up on everything... wish I’d just spent the money to get the cordless Dyson to be honest
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon Purchase EVER...before it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Update: this is so weird. Literally just uploaded my review after having this for a year and a half...and then it died today. Just stopped working. Won’t even turn on. :-( I love this vacuum SO much. It’s hands down the best Amazon purchase I’ve ever made...(and I am a proud Prime member and now that I think of it, probably shop way too much on this site). Anyways, it’s the strongest little sucking machine. Mighty!! Easy to use and clean. MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: broke after a few years of moderate use
customer_reviews.text: honestly liked it at first but after it broke they told me the 5-year warranty only covered the motor. the customer service guy was a jerk with a BOISTON accent and told me I could pay $71.00 PLUS SHIPPING AND TAXES (which he wouldnt tell me without me providing him with my full street address) to have a part sent, which i could replace myself and he said there's no guarantee it would work. i liked this while it worked so im giving two stars instead of ONE for their lousy customer service and bogus 'warranty'
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We have a very large and very hairy dog and this vacuum works great. The only thing that is annoying is the hair does get caught around the brush roll, but it's easy to get untangled. We recently moved and have almost all hardwood and it works really well for that. It works well on low pile rugs. Our shaggier rug that has since been tossed (white did not work well with dog) wasn't easy to vacuum. The vacuum would not glide across it, even with suction released.
customer_reviews.author: Moonjelly

customer_reviews.title: Picture of vacuum not accurate
customer_reviews.text: See hose at bottom of this picture. Not as advertised on website.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Weber

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not get this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: If you, like me, have always bought the cheapest possible vacuum, I am here to say that it is worth actually getting a good one. I never would have imagined how much of a difference it makes. I am now like some ridiculous commercial, smiling and dancing while vacuuming, because the fancy vacuum makes cleaning so much easier. I got this one for $99 on Amazon on Black Friday and highly recommend it. Just wait for a sale and do it. After six months, I can say that this is one of the more worthwhile adulting purchases that I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, but I wish cord was longer
customer_reviews.text: I have owned dyson vacuums forever, a few weeks ago my dyson broke beyond repair so I figured I would try something different. So far the shark has been pretty comparable. First I should say it has good suction, and is easy to use. I love the lift off option. What I don’t like is when I am using the wand, the vacuum tips over super easy. The other thing I don’t like is the cord is short so I have to plug it in each room. Overall it seems to be a pretty good vacuum, and you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: SaraR

customer_reviews.title: Nope!!  Just nope.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad vac for hard floors and may work on very “flat” carpeting. Had to return. Stuck to my frieze carpet and would not budge. There’s no height adjustment and you’re supposed to turn a suction reducer to get it from sticking to your carpeting. Not only did it stay stuck with the suction turned all the way down, but am I the only one who thinks turning the suction, on a vacuum, down seems a little counterproductive? The narrow width of the head makes it maneuverable in tight spaces, but is so small it would take forever to vacuum my whole house. Assuming, of course, that it wasn’t stuck in one place.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap. A toy Vacuum Cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within 30 minutes of use. Grabbed a corner of a bed sheet and the beater never worked again. Add on parts do not fit any other standard vacuum. My wrist was cramped because I had to hold it at a very specific angle to clean my stairs. A toy vacuum cleaner. I am shocked that this actually was passed by the product team at Shark. Can only be used to clean Barbie's Fun House. No wonder it was so cheap..... Run away........Far away. Was in the garbage bin within hours of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: John Z

customer_reviews.title: Horrible warranty service
customer_reviews.text: I bought in 2016 and use it only to vacuum my living room each day. It had a 5 year warranty and the hose cracked in two places and bottom connector got brittle. I have a bunch of tape holding it together. I called their customer service for the 1st time ever and the repwas going to charge 19.99 just to ship the hose and connector. If I wanted the whole handle, it was going to be an extra 29.99. I said no way and that I’ll just keep using my taped up vacuum. Won’t buy another Shark product again after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M

customer_reviews.title: Bad description, great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a warehouse deal. According to description, it was a warehouse deal because package was damaged but when I received the vacuum, it had obvious dust in canister and filters were dirty. I wish the description had been more accurate. But the vacuum worked as described. This is my third Shark vacuum, same model in the past 12 years. They are tough and are able to keep up with my kids, dogs, cats. I would, and will, buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mthro5pls1

customer_reviews.title: Newer ones have shorter cord!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second vacuum of the same model. The original one lasted just over 7 years of HEAVY use before the suction just wasn't as good and we decided to buy a new one. The new one looks exactly the same, cost the same, BUT the cord is 5' shorter than the original. The vacuum works great for our use (other that the shorter cord, argh). I will say we do not have pets and we do regularly change the 3 filters on it.
customer_reviews.author: Peach Ring

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and lightweight. We're happy with quality.
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with it. It has so much suction that we have to stand on the edges of the area rugs to keep it from sucking it up. I can't get over how much quieter it is than every other vacuum cleaner we've ever had. Although it's quiet, my Chihuahua still doesn't like it and runs out of the room. I just wish it had room to store every accessory on it and that it had a thinner profile so it would go under the bird cage. Other than that, no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, excellent features, clean HEPA filter.
customer_reviews.text: This is a ver good vacuum, especially at this price point. We had some lead dust issues in our house and needed a HEPA vacuum ASAP. This was the best deal on the market. Not only does it feature a HEPA filter, it has a ton of incredible features---a versatile rotating head, a lift-away feature so you can use it as a canister vacuum, several options for hoses, hardwood and carpet suction settings. It works great and we're very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Payne

customer_reviews.title: No more pet hair on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I turned this vacuum on and my son said it looked like a cotton candy machine inside. He was right! I could have made a new dog from all the hair it removed. The container is easy to empty. The machine is not heavy and almost feels self-propelled. Be very careful if you have loose loops on carpet, loose threads on upholstery, or fringe on a rug - this vacuum has enough suction to pull them out!
customer_reviews.author: magnolia mama

customer_reviews.title: Not for high pile rugs or carpets!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT vacuum! The suction is so great, that it picks up things that my old vacuum left behind. The reason that I took 1 star off, was because this vacuum doesn’t have a height adjuster. We have high pile rugs in our living room, and the roller would become jammed, even when we adjusted the suction (on the handle) to low, making the rugs impossible to vacuum with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great all around vacuum. After 7 years of hard use with 2 constantly shedding dogs and through 3 houses we are going to replace our older version with the same model. We’ve used our shark on carpet, hardwood, and tile and it worked great on everything. Excellent bucket capacity as well. I was so glad to see it as a prime day deal so we could get the same one again! Our old one still works but has seen some wear and tear over the years and doesn’t quite suck like it used to. It will get a good cleaning and will be donated to goodwill where I’m sure someone will be able to use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: RVG

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum purchase I've made
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for over a year. I have two dogs and a cat. One of my dogs is a german "shedder" and my cat is long hair. This vacuum picks up the hair and cat litter without any problem. It doesn't blow dust or dump litter when you stop it. I've tried several other, more expensive brands and always ended up running into problems. This was does an amazing job, the lift away feature makes it perfect for stairs and couches as well. Best vacuum I've ever owned, it isn't even a comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Milby

customer_reviews.title: Extension wand broke and Shark hasn't responded in weeks
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great for the first 9 months. However, there is a button you can push to unlatch the extension wand from the base. For some reason, it will not secure. The machine cannot be used since the extension wand also serves to connect the handle to the base. I have attempted to contact Shark for several weeks. Once you go through all the prompts, it says due to technical difficulties, no one is available. I have emailed as well with no luck. I bought the extended warranty but since it is still under manufacturer warranty, I cannot make a claim.
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: In love!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely impressed with this vacuum. The suction is so very impressive compares to my store bought vacuum. It's light and it glides and reaches every crevice. It was easy to put together. And comes with a bag to put the other parts. Lots of attachments for dog hair and cool features to detach and clean hard to reach high places. I also love the feature where I can turn the switch to bare floor and roll right onto my wood paneled floor and get up the dirt. There is also an attachment with two washable pads for dusting bare floors! What more could you ask for? You couldn't. This vacuum has it all covered!! I love my shark!
customer_reviews.author: PunkyBookster

customer_reviews.title: must buy if you're looking for a incredible vacuum
customer_reviews.text: INCREDIBLE VACUUM! I ordered it because it was listed on an article as one of the top vacuums of 2020 for quality and affordability. In fact it was #1 on the list. So I ordered it with high expectations and I was shocked it still managed to exceed them! I have never been so excited to vacuum the house. It is kind of heavy which is my only complaint, however it basically pushes itself! Great motor, extra long cord, great attachments, modern look and made my carpet look new, clean and even fluffier then I have ever seen it! Totally a killer price! Love this new addition to our cleaning cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vaccum. I've always had cheap vaccums from living in a small apartment on my own, but when I moved into a house with my boyfriend I decided I needed to try something real with two dogs, one being a Lab/Husky/Rottweiler mix. The vaccum works amazing, even almost 2 years later. The cannister just continues to fill but makes everything feel cleaner. I will say it is top heavy and sometimes falls over standing on its own. That's annoying but doesn't happen enough for me to feel the need to get another vaccum. I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Fetters

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I reached out to friends when I needed to replace my Dyson. Overwhelmingly they recommended this. I have a mixture of wood floors and carpeted bedrooms. I have often had issues with vacuums not picking up small hard items from wooden floors, such as grit. This vacuum is fantastic. Best one I have ever bought. It picks up EVERYTHING including dead spiders (ugh). It is light, easy to operate, I like to transition from hard to carpet you click another button, and you can also change the strength of the suction, which I lessen on my newer carpet. Best purchase ever !
customer_reviews.author: Liz Horner

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum, but the lift away didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: This was very good vacuum for a small apartment, we have been using it for approximately a year and half. However, all at the sudden the roller stopped working. The vacuum still working as it does for hardwood floor but for carpet does not work anymore. Very disappointing, for the price of the vacuum, I was expecting a longer life expectancy.
customer_reviews.author: jjuanro99

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, easy snap-together design
customer_reviews.text: Just received this so can not speak for durability, but this seems to be a well-made vacuum with a lot of great design features. I watched the unboxing video ahead of delivery and was able to put it all together very easily, just sliding things on and snapping in place. It handles very easily and picks up great. We just had construction work done so had tons of fine dust. The cannister dumps out very conveniently, but I'm actually online today to check on whether I can rinse out the cannister, since a lot of the fine dust is clinging to the sides. But I LOVE not having to deal with bags. So all looks great so far!
customer_reviews.author: JustMeee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: day 2 of the vacuum. I have 3 Dysons- & now this Shark. It is amazing- & because it's smaller , it fits under my kitchen cabinets and fits between chair legs & almost goes under the couch. One of the first things I noticed was that my house smelled CLEAN afterwards- then I read that there is no "exhaust" air going back out- great for allergies. Also it has a dial to tone down the suction for area rugs. My only complain is that the cord does not seem long enough. I have 5 dogs- & this gets up every hair!!!!! LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: greyhound girl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with this one. I replaced a Shark Navigator with this thinking they would be similar. This "Professional" model uses the same head for bare floor and carpet. I have mostly bare floors, and this one doesn't pick up nearly as well. Also, it's not lighted, which was a big help on the other. And using the attachments and hose is much more difficult because the hose doesn't disconnect easily. Sorry I bought it. Spend an extra few dollars and get the upgraded Shark.
customer_reviews.author: efrommel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used to hate vacuuming because I knew my old, cheap vacuum wasn't really picking anything up. I bought this vacuum hoping it would actually suck! It's AMAZING! I don't mind vacuuming anymore! We have 2 cats and a large lab/shepherd mix dog. Our house is filled with little fur balls and this vacuum picks them all up. I still haven't found a vacuum that picks up the little pieces of litter that stick to the cats' feet as they exit the litter box, but this one works better than all the others I've had. I love all the possibilities with all the attachments and parts that come off. Vacuuming the stairs is quite easy now! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Denise K.

customer_reviews.title: really good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good vacuum. Excellent for picking up cat hair (I'm a multi-cat household) but not as great at picking up human hair; at least long human hair. My hair is long and thick and it does a good job, but hair gets wrapped around the rollers and after a while needs to be cut off, which is sort of a pain, but not the worst to deal with. Would still recommend because the suction power picking up smaller hair is excellent. Great for picking up dirt as well. Long hair seems to be the only catch.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t match the description
customer_reviews.text: The description states it comes with a Dust-Away hard floor attachment + 2 washable microfiber pads. There were no microfiber pads in the package and the attachment (picture attached) doesn’t look like the picture in the description that would hold a microfiber pad. Can you help?
customer_reviews.author: ess

customer_reviews.title: stopped working day 1!  Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This was rated highly so decided to give it a try. Seemed like it worked fairly well right out of the box, did a quick vacuum of a rug & seemed great. Used it first day to clean the house and it kept stopping - no suction, then it would stop when I tried to use on an area rug - needless to say we are returning it. Plus the canister hose is so small, you can't reach corners. It is virtually impossible to find a good vacuum these days.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: Bagless
customer_reviews.text: Its new , if the hose doesn't break in six months I will be thrilled . I'm sure to have future comments Past experience has proven Shark to lie to my face. After three months the cord becomes unimaginable . It got very stiff and won't lay flat as it did when new. Otherwise the power is good and the machine is versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Bikers56flh

customer_reviews.title: Great suction!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty impressed (and grossed out) at the amount that this vacuum picked up from our rug. I love that you can switch modes between bare floor and carpet and it really picks up things well without spreading it everywhere, which I've had issues with with other vacuums. This has a nice array of attachments and I like the way that it swivels. My only complaint is that I wish the extender attachment was a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Maya J. Worley-Mann

customer_reviews.title: THE BESTTTTT
customer_reviews.text: I've had Dyson's that aren't as good as this vacuum. I bought mine because I have cats and lots of cat hair. It picks up all the hair so easily! I vacuum my tile floors all the time and its great! It even vacuums up all the little pieces of cat litter and doesn't spread them everywhere. The suction power is great. The attachments are useful. Overall the BEST vacuum I've ever owned. Period!
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great suction! By far the best vacuum I've owned. I have 2 cats, a dog and 3 kids. My only complaint is that my golden retrievers hair seems to wrap around the brush and I need to clean it out every now and then. Perhaps hold out for a price drop. I put it in my cart for $200 and watched it for awhile and finally purchased when I saw it drop to $150.
customer_reviews.author: KateP

customer_reviews.title: Not for Thick Carpets!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you have thick pile carpets, or even medium pile. The suction is too powerful even at its lowest setting. I can't even use the attachment on the carpet because the hose is too short and it didn't come with an extension wand. I'm sick about it. The problem with ordering from Amazon is that it's hard to return a very heavy appliance, and this is one heavy sucker! It's hard to lift and I can't even imagine carrying it upstairs. Do not buy this product. It's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Collins, author

customer_reviews.title: Head unit will not last long.
customer_reviews.text: The head unit on this vacuum failed at the two year mark. Shark advertises a 5 year warranty but it does not cover the head unit. I took the vacuum to a local vacuum repair store and the owner of the store told me how cheap and unreliable these machines are and to make matters worse, the head unit is not repairable. We called Shark customer service and they were less than helpful. Charged us for a new head unit. We are very dissapointed with this vacuum and this company. We will not be purchasing anymore Shark products.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Heath

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. in this shark
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. in this shark, had a lift off, liked much better. hair and dirt get caught on sides of canister, up at top, had to get a straw to push down. would not reccomend, the Shark likt away was so much better, and less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really great vacuum. I bought this 7 years ago and now I'm having issues. I think its the motor, but my husband will be playing around with it and if anything we will have a backup. The lifespan of a vacuum is about 7 years so I think if it lasted this long, its a pretty good vacuum overall. It sucks up dog hair, people hair, dirt, dust, and everything else. It has great suction! I love this vacuum. Easy to clean. Easy to obtain parts. I mean really what is there not to like?
customer_reviews.author: CCR 71

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: I got this vacuum to replace my 10 yr old shark navigator (which was awesome) and this vacuum is a terrible replacement. The extension hose is extremely short and the handle that pulls away to use attachments with is very non-ergonomic. Unfortunately I waited too long to try to return it and am out of the window and now I'm stuck with it. The thing constantly falls over when trying to use any attachment. If you're looking to get a new vacuum, get literally any other one.
customer_reviews.author: FergyMcFerguson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service - broken beater bar after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old vacuum has a broken beater bar. It wasn't used that much. Shark has worst customer service ever. Guy could barely speak English and argued that warranty doesn't apply even though has a 1 yr warranty on defective parts/workmanship. The worst part was told I had to PAY $75 for a new beater bar. Not happening. Anyone with half a brain cell would know this is unusual for a part to break like this on a 4 MONTH old vacuum and this clearly qualifies as defective. My husband liked this unit a lot until this happened. Had Shark stood by their product I would have written this off to just bad luck about the part.
customer_reviews.author: mbw

customer_reviews.title: Great for floors, may be a problem on high pile carpets?
customer_reviews.text: I just got it so can only say that it came well protected and packaged. It was very easy to put it together. I had watched the video before purchasing which showed how to do so so i didn’t even need to read the instructions. The only issue i have is i tried to go from wood to high pile area rug and it kept shutting down? I stopped and read the guide but i still can’t figure out how to use it on high pile carpet? It’s my second shark lift-away, i like my other one better but paid a lot more money for it. But they do the same job except for the high carpet issue?
customer_reviews.author: LGgirl

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money! Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many vacuums in my life and this one is my favorite. I have three cats and a baby in the house. This vacuum cleaner has great suction. It's the easiest to use. Easy empty. Easy to take the canister off to use on the steps. I have both hardwood floors and carpet so the button let's you switch right from roller on mode to roller off mode. I can't say enough about it. It's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you want a great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Did not think I would be really impressed, but I was. I used my old vacuum and then the Shark on the same carpet and wood floor. The dirt the Shark picked up made me think I had really been not cleaning my floors! I love it. It is lighter, easier to maneuver and a dream to empty. It takes a bit of redoing to get the lift away feature to work but so what? I think this is a wonderful product. Good by Hoover, Eureka and Sears. I will keep my tank vacuum for special tasks, but the Shark is the go to choice.
customer_reviews.author: golf nut

customer_reviews.title: not worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: This lift-away isn't user friendly for me. When using the hose, it doesn't stretch very much at all. It really only works if the tank is lifted off, which is not very convenient when doing a small job. I previously had a shark navigator and wish I had saved the extra cost of this and bought another one. The suction is very good on this vac and I like the adjustable suction feature. The tool caddy is in the way and inconvenient. Also the cord doesn't stay up in the clip.
customer_reviews.author: nannk

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this new friend! Picked this up for my new house that has mostly wood/pergo floors and it works like a dream. Assembly was really easy, but I suggest watching the instruction video included in the listing. The turning capabilities are a little awkward to get used to and control at first. The hose is also pretty stiff, but I imagine it will loosen up over time. The tank is really easy to empty and reattach. The 3 included attachments are great, but there is only a spot attached to the machine for 2 of them, wth?! All that being said, I can't wait to vacuum again!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B.

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum, kind of awkward to move around
customer_reviews.text: I use the vacuum for both hardwood floors and carpets, and it does a great job of cleaning both. The only things I don't like about it are the cord (you have to manually wrap it up) and the fact that it's a bit unwieldy. It doesn't always stay upright and I end up dragging it around, and it's a bit awkward to carry and otherwise move. It also doesn't include a small surface cleaner, which I really need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: warranty no good
customer_reviews.text: unit stopped working in 1 year 8 months. the warranty is for 5 years. but the bottom motor is not turning the beater bar and they said it is not covered makes no sense they want $80.00 for the bottom and it my just be in the switch. So i will pay $80.00 for a part that may be bad i paid $130.00 for the vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell gray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Suction
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this vacuum!! It sucks up everything 😁 PROS: super light weight, lots of attachments that are easy to add or remove, can use just the canester for easily cleaning the stairs, long cord. CONS: no light, and seems a little top heavy so when I stand it up I eyeball it for a few seconds to make sure she’s not going to topple over.
customer_reviews.author: amber smith

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this vacuum for over a year, and it is still in amazing condition. I love it, because if there is a clog, every single tube is accessible. Super easy to clean and maintain. As long as you maintenance the wheel (cutting off long hair/string/etc) and wash the filter regularly, it is ALWAYS amazing at picking up hair. I have a husky and a cat, and this thing is a godsend. It's great for hard to reach areas, as it's detachable in so many different places. Four stars for the hardwood floors as I still have to go back over with a broom to get everything, but it still does an awesome job!
customer_reviews.author: Trisana

customer_reviews.title: Favorite vacuum ever/ strong suction
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I’ve owned in a long time. I’ve had Orecks, Dirt Devil, etc This is thinner than it looks in the picture and I’m happy about that. It’s cleaned up plaster dust great! I have not used attachments yet. Easily switch from floor to carpet and rug with 1 button. I have a lot of shag carpets and it cleans them (although the very thick one I have to go over it again since I get the red light once in a while. I would buy again if it breaks which I don’t see that happening anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Bare floor hero is missing from the product !! -Update
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item strictly because there was a supposed "bare floor hero" as part of the included attachments. The "hero" was not to be found in the packaging. This is one of the reasons I hesitate to order major products online. I have hard wood floors and did not want a vacuum that just "shuts off the brush roller" when used on bare floors. I may update this review, once i have been able to contact the manufacturer. Remains to be seen if I will be satisfied. Called Shark this morning, and the "hero" should have indeed been included in the packaging. Company sending out at no charge. Could not be more satisfied at Shark customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Fyock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I've ever owned. It does everything as advertised. My cat likes to make his litter fly everywhere out of the box, but my Shark swallows it up off the hardwood floor to the last grain. On the carpeted floor, the suction is unbelievable. The twisting head gets under raised bookcases so I don't have to move furniture. It also cleans right up to the baseboards so there's no hand sweeping required. No appliance I've ever owned has lived up to expectations as well as my new Shark. I highly recommend this vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Manicreader

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 7 y.o. Hoover. Was a little concerned with some 1 star reviews but after a couple of months everything is working well. Very powerful suction and I love the flexibility with the way the unit separates from a floor model to a stair unit to a handheld with long attachments for drapes,etc. I gave it a 4 vs. 5 b/c the attachments holder is flimsy and the brush/wand fall of easily. Also, no place to store the rolling brush that I use on the stairs (I keep it in the closet now).
customer_reviews.author: tnc_vol

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I have used an Oreck for years. Decided it was time for a replacement and wanted to purchase something less expensive. After reading a lot of reviews decided to give this Shark a try. It is heavier but easy to maneuver. I like that the head swivels. I do wish the cord was longer. But this little vacuum has great suction. The carpet looks really plush after using. I like the fact that I don’t have to purchase bags anymore. Am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Gal

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had such horrible luck with vacuums until this one!!! Self-propelled, turns on a dime and picks up all of my dogs hair (and boy does he shed)!!! Worth every penny!!! Thank you Shark!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK vacuum, poor attachments.
customer_reviews.text: Suction is very strong, and will pull up area rugs, even with handle air vent open. Assembly and lift-away are easy, but hose is short, and the canister is not really light if being carried for extended time. The included attachments are inadequate - just a short crevice tool and small brush, no bare floor attachment. It is not easy to reach up with the handle and hose. Standard size attachments will not fit Shark without a hose converter. Otherwise, authentic Shark attachments are expensive, and not even interchangeable between Shark models. I would have been better served with a more versatile, more easily maneuverable machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Koestner

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: So I had the original. The only reason I had to get a new one is bc the hand vacuum of it finally cracked and I don’t even think it was the product My kids used the vacuum all the time now. I’m 40 and had original since about 27 So the new one.... works the same so far hope is lasts as long but the cord is shorter!!!!! And by a lot!!! So that’s super annoying It’s seriously a short cord attached Other than the short cord this vacuum is worth it
customer_reviews.author: tracy c.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing: Great Until It Wasn't Anymore
customer_reviews.text: We bought our Shark vacuum in 2016. About two months ago, it suddenly lost nearly all of its suction power. We tried new filters, cleaned it top to bottom, checked for obstructions: nothing. This is really disappointing that the vacuum would just die after four years. A vacuum should last far longer than that, especially in this price range. Truly disappointing. As much as we liked this vacuum when it worked, we won't buy another Shark.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how my central vacuum system wasn't working very well. I was amazed how much dirt this vacuum picked up. Love that. The removal canister for vacuuming furniture was a little awkward. Very hard to vacuum furniture while holding the canister. I don't have any stairs so I'm pretty sure it will work for them better. Overall, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: duck tape for a year before it became useless. I will go back to the old tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 3 years ago because of the Shark brand. Well, a few months after moderate use the seal blew out around the exhaust filter assembly. I used it with , don't laugh , duck tape for a year before it became useless. I will go back to the old tried and true booger or eureka in the future.
customer_reviews.author: mark d.

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never use a Bissel vacuum again!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST vacuum I’ve ever owned. Yes, it’s expensive but WELL WORTH THE COST! Ive used the Bissel Wind Tunnel for 1 year and it stopped working. Bought another one and it stopped working 1 year later. In 2 years I spent $190 on vacuums which are complete junk compared to this Shark vacuum. I’m constantly cleaning our rugs because of my 6 yr old boxer who tracks in dirt more then anything I’ve ever seen. This vacuum has made my cleaning experience so much better then I’ve ever expected. GET A SHARK VACUUM AND DONT WASTE ANYMORE OF YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY ON BISSEL VACUUMS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Women

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum for an inexpensive price It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Shark Navigator Lift-Away that I have purchased. Now I have one for upstairs and downstairs. This model Shark is the best vacuum that I have purchased. It is light weight and dependable and fits in spaces that others cannot. My first one replaced a vacuum that starts wth D which cost a lot more and was heavy and cumbersome to use. Believe me, I love to vacuum and have had many vacuums over the years and this is the best!
customer_reviews.author: judy s

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum! I've had it for almost 5 years now and it still works great. It's able to completely disassemble for cleaning which helps to maintain proper working order. I have 3 cats and a dog and this works great for removing hair/fur from carpet, furniture and even on hard floors. I love all the attachments that came with it, and its ability to detach the hose in order to vacuum hard to reach places like the ceiling, fans and behind our furnaces. I recommend this vacuum to everyone who asks or comments on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Beason

customer_reviews.title: Can I please return this?! Who makes such an impossible to move/heavy vacuum in 202!?
customer_reviews.text: Can I please return this?! Why so many good reviews if its impossible to move with one hand! It is so heavy/difficult to move on carpet. My daughter can't vacuum with it. It is insanely difficult for me, I have to push with both hands, and need a 3rd hand to hold the cord. This doesn't make my cleaning heavy, it makes my cleaning 10 times harder.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Will not roll or move on carpet
customer_reviews.text: I made the assumption that all vacuums have height adjustments when I bought this vacuum. My carpet is not shag, it's not even that plush, and yet the vacuum sticks and will not budge when it hits the carpet. The rollers freeze and the vacuum becomes immovable. Sadly I got rid of the box so now I'm stuck with a vacuum that I can only use on hard surfaces. If you have anything other than really short carpet then you should look at different options.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Stevers

customer_reviews.title: Makes vacuuming fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum so much. Works great on my hard floors with the microfiber attachment and picks up pet hair magnificently on carpet. I love that the canister opens from the bottom and the top so it's easy to empty every time. Has not gotten plugged up once as opposed to Dyson's overpriced piece of junk. Lightweight and easy to maneuver. My only complaint would be the small upholstery tool that seems to have broken already but I probably just need to change the belt or something, haven't figured it out yet. I'm still giving a 5-star review because the overall performance of this vacuum is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUCTION
customer_reviews.text: I am a Shark convert. This vacuum is amazing. I used it on just the first floor of our house last, only 3 days after vacuuming with our old vacuum, and the dust bin was almost entirely filled! I don't know whether to be grossed out or thrilled? FYI - I do have 3 kids but we don't have any pets, don't wear shoes in the house, and I vacuum on the regular. This shocked me! This vacuum SUCKS - in the good way! I love that you can take it on the stairs without the weight of the entire vacuum also - huge advantage :) Would absolutely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, much easier than my old other brand (D). The plastic became brittle, repairs impossible, so SHARK was probably a good choice. The photos in the ad are not correct, shows a floor pad which is not included, so I asked for product support. SO far no reply, so I researched on my own. Found that the attachment sent for smooth floors is probably a better way.
customer_reviews.author: JBW

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a vacuum snob. I’m hard on them and we have 7 pets. I Love this vacuum. It’s a solid choice. It’s light, easy to maneuver, works on all types of floors, and has useful accessories. It’s great for long and short pet hair. Excellent suction power. Easy to empty. Only reason I don’t give it 5 stars is because I’m constantly knocking it over. The reason it’s easy to knock over though is because it’s light and narrow to get into tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Saints072

customer_reviews.title: Worst vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The head is way too small. When we went to use the vac the first time on carpeting...it sucks itself to the floor and you can't even move it. The head stopped as a result of being bogged down. I'm pretty shocked at any positive reviews. This vacuum sucks!
customer_reviews.author: matcon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: We finally decided that our almost 7 year old shark needed to be replaced. We purchased another shark because we love this brand. I vacuumed our living room and this is all the stuff that came up! It’s gross yet satisfying. It’s a great vacuum. We will always choose shark.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stordahl

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: I was given this Shark 2 years ago as a gift. I gave this product as a gift this year to my sister. That’s how much I believe in this product. It’s so easy to put together, takes five minutes. When you run it over a rug it is almost self propelled, so easy to push. Taking it apart to use in sliding door tracks and windowsills is easy too. Turn it off pop the top and drop the dirt in the wastebasket, done . Great item .
customer_reviews.author: Reader Rose

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 8 months; Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: We had this vacuum for 8 months, and it broke. It worked pretty well before that time, but then one day, the bottom half just broke off while vacuuming. We contacted customer service and were extremely disappointed. Despite spending so much on a vacuum and being loyal customers for years, they would not honor the warranty and give us a replacement. We have owned Shark vacuums for years but will now stay away from this brand in light of our recent experience with customer service and their failure to honor the written warranty. Now looking into Dyson instead as we’ve heard better things with that brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE VACUUM CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vacuum and received it in two days. Very easy to put together. I watched the video and it took me about two minutes. I proceeded to vacuum my living room and kitchen that had only been vacuumed yesterday. I have a long haired cat and what this picked up is astounding. It is also very easy to maneuver and lift. The swivel feature is very nice and helps get into tight spaces with very little effort. I am very pleased with my purchase and would recommend this vacuum to others.
customer_reviews.author: Socalartgal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - so happy
customer_reviews.text: This product puts my old Hoover Windtunnel to shame. I disliked the hoover after about 3 uses because it's suction on floors was awful. I thought it was cleaning the carpets fine until I received and used the Shark Navigator. We have two cats and a non-shedding dog that bring in grass, leaves, and dirt after being outside. The Shark Navigator picks up the cat hair and all of the outdoor debris on both carpets and hard floors. I'm so happy I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: sarah e

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is terrible. Thought it was going to be great when we first purchased it because the reviews weren't so bad. We have had it for a month or so now and it has been clogged with hair 3 times and not it is spitting stuff back out when you turn it off. tried to vacuum up dried oats on hard wood floor and it wouldn't even suck it up. The cord is also really really short. The only positive is its light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Motor died 2 months in. Disappointing defective part replacement policy.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum itself worked well but the motor died 2 months in. I called Shark, who determined product was defective and volunteered to send me a new motor but charged me the $20 for shipping. Pretty frustrating to have to pay anything that early on. The customer service rep was cordial but acted like he was doing me a favor by not charging me to replace their defective motor. I guess I've been spoiled by companies like Apple among many others who, when I brought in my watch with a defective battery issue, apologized for the inconvenience and sent me a brand new watch at no cost to me. Will pay more attention to repair policies in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gardner

product_meta.title: Shark Navigator Lift-Away Professional NV356E, White and Silver
product_meta.description: Style:NV356EA lightweight 2 in 1 Lift Away upright vacuum with a detachable canister for portable cleaning power. With the push of a button, Lift Away technology allows you to lift the canister away and easily clean in hard to reach areas. This vacuum is also equipped with a completely sealed system and a HEPA filter to trap dust and allergens. It also includes a Brush roll Shutoff button so you can easily switch between carpet and bare floor cleaning, and fine particles off your bare floors.
feature_bullets: Dust cup capacity 2.2 quarts; Lift away; Press a button to lift the canister away and easily clean hard to reach areas
Anti-allergen complete seal technology plus a HEPA filter; Traps 99.9 percent of dust and allergens inside the vacuum
Powerful and lightweight; Portable and versatile at 13.7 pounds
Brush roll shutoff; Deep carpet and gentle bare floor cleaning
Hard floor hero attachment not included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars12,834 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Specific Uses For Product: Pet Hair, Carpet, Hard Surface, Bare Floors
